title: [BUG] macOS Native library libSkiaSharp.dylib is not signed with a Developer ID
body:
Apple has refused the notarization of my application with an error message "The binary is not signed with a valid Developer ID certificate." on the libSkiaSharp.dylib.

This command line "codesign -dv --verbose=4 libSkiaSharp.dylib" show that the native skia library shipped inside the SkiaSharp nuget is signed with an adoc signature.

The same command executed on a Mono native library indicates "Developer ID Application: Xamarin Inc (7V723M9SQ5)" as code signing authority.

Is it possible to sign macOS native library with a valid Developer ID to pass apple notarization process?
Thanks
